ng-class="{true:'btn-primary'}[$ctrl.clicked == $index && $ctrl.date==row0 && $ctrl.monthSelected==$ctrl.selectedMonth && $ctrl.yearSelected==$ctrl.selectedYear ]" ng-class="{'btn-primary':$ctrl.clicked == $index && $ctrl.date==row0 && $ctrl.monthSelected==$ctrl.selectedMonth && $ctrl.yearSelected==$ctrl.selectedYear , 'disabled':row0=='--'}"
